name: Swords n' Hoes
description:
You wake up in a fantasy world on a farm with only your trusty hoe. You must use this hoe to slay monsters to get seeds for your first proper weapons which you will need to progress on and get stronger weapons from stronger monsters and fight the final boss at the end of the forest.

Swords n' Hoes is a top down 2D action adventure game developed by FrontRowGames as a University Assignment.
